scripts.postinstall:
npm --prefix server install && (test -f server/.env || (test -f server/.env.example && cp server/.env.example server/.env) || echo 'DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db"
PORT=4000
JWT_SECRET="change-me"
CORS_ORIGIN="http://localhost:5173"' > server/.env) && npm --prefix server run prisma:generate && npm --prefix server run db:push && npm --prefix server run prisma:seed || true
